title: 新约 - 马太福音(Matthew) - 第 6 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 马太福音(Matthew) -- 第 6 章 ( 本篇共有 28 章 )

lineList.en: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men, to be seen of them: otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven.
lineList.cn: 你们要小心，不可将善事行在人的面前，故意叫他们看见。若是这样，就不能得你们天父的赏赐了。

lineList.en: Therefore when thou doest thine alms, do not sound a trumpet before thee, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may have glory of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.
lineList.cn: 所以你施舍的时候，不可在你前面吹号，像那假冒为善的人，在会堂里和街道上所行的，故意要得人的荣耀。我实在告诉你们，他们已经得了他们的赏赐。

lineList.en: But when thou doest alms, let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth:
lineList.cn: 你施舍的时候，不要叫左手知道右手所作的。

lineList.en: That thine alms may be in secret: and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly.
lineList.cn: 要叫你施舍的事行在暗中，你父在暗中察看，必报答你。（有古卷作必在明处报答你）

lineList.en: And when thou prayest, thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are: for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets, that they may be seen of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.
lineList.cn: 你们祷告的时候，不可像那假冒为善的人，爱站在会堂里，和十字路口上祷告，故意叫人看见。我实在告诉你们，他们已经得了他们的赏赐。

lineList.en: But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father which is in secret; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly.
lineList.cn: 你祷告的时候，要进你的内屋，关上门，祷告你在暗中的父，你父在暗中察看，必然报答你。

lineList.en: But when ye pray, use not vain repetitions, as the heathen do: for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking.
lineList.cn: 你们祷告，不可像外邦人，用许多重复话。他们以为话多了必蒙垂听。

lineList.en: Be not ye therefore like unto them: for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of, before ye ask him.
lineList.cn: 你们不可效法他们。因为你们没有祈求以先，你们所需用的，你们的父早已知道了。

lineList.en: After this manner therefore pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.
lineList.cn: 所以你们祷告，要这样说，我们在天上的父，愿人都尊你的名为圣。

lineList.en: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.
lineList.cn: 愿你的国降临，愿你的旨意行在地上，如同行在天上。

lineList.en: Give us this day our daily bread.
lineList.cn: 我们日用的饮食，今日赐给我们。

lineList.en: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.
lineList.cn: 免我们的债，如同我们免了人的债。

lineList.en: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil: For thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever. Amen.
lineList.cn: 不叫我们遇见试探，救我们脱离凶恶，（或作脱离恶者）因为国度，权柄，荣耀，全是你的，直到永远，阿们。（有古卷无因为至阿们等字）

lineList.en: For if ye forgive men their trespasses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you:
lineList.cn: 你们饶恕人的过犯，你们的天父也必饶恕你们的过犯。

lineList.en: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses, neither will your Father forgive your trespasses.
lineList.cn: 你们不饶恕人的过犯，你们的天父也必不饶恕你们的过犯。

lineList.en: Moreover when ye fast, be not, as the hypocrites, of a sad countenance: for they disfigure their faces, that they may appear unto men to fast. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.
lineList.cn: 你们禁食的时候，不可像那假冒为善的人，脸上带着愁容。因为他们把脸弄得难看，故意叫人看出他们是禁食。我实在告诉你们，他们已经得了他们的赏赐。

lineList.en: But thou, when thou fastest, anoint thine head, and wash thy face;
lineList.cn: 你们禁食的时候，要梳头洗脸，

lineList.en: That thou appear not unto men to fast, but unto thy Father which is in secret: and thy Father, which seeth in secret, shall reward thee openly.
lineList.cn: 不要叫人看出你禁食来，只叫你暗中的父看见。你父在暗中察看，必然报答你。

lineList.en: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal:
lineList.cn: 不要为自己积攒财宝在地上，地上有虫子咬，能锈坏，也有贼挖窟窿来偷。

lineList.en: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt, and where thieves do not break through nor steal:
lineList.cn: 只要积攒财宝在天上，天上没有虫子咬，不能锈坏，也没有贼挖窟窿来偷。

lineList.en: For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
lineList.cn: 因为你的财宝在那里，你的心也在那里。

lineList.en: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.
lineList.cn: 眼睛就是身上的灯。你的眼睛若了亮，全身就光明。

lineList.en: But if thine eye be evil, thy whole body shall be full of darkness. If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness, how great is that darkness!
lineList.cn: 你的眼睛若昏花，全身就黑暗。你里头的光若黑暗了，那黑暗是何等大呢。

lineList.en: No man can serve two masters: for either he will hate the one, and love the other; or else he will hold to the one, and despise the other. Ye cannot serve God and mammon.
lineList.cn: 一个人不能事奉两个主。不是恶这个爱那个，就是重这个轻那个。你们不能又事奉神，又事奉玛门。（玛门是财利的意思）

lineList.en: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?
lineList.cn: 所以我告诉你们，不要为生命忧虑，吃什么，喝什么。为身体忧虑，穿什么。生命不胜于饮食吗，身体不胜于衣裳吗。

lineList.en: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?
lineList.cn: 你们看那天上的飞鸟，也不种，也不收，也不积蓄在仓里，你们的天父尚且养活他。你们不比飞鸟贵重得多吗。

lineList.en: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature?
lineList.cn: 你们那一个能用思虑，使寿数多加一刻呢。（或作使身量多加一肘呢）

lineList.en: And why take ye thought for raiment? Consider the lilies of the field, how they grow; they toil not, neither do they spin:
lineList.cn: 何必为衣裳忧虑呢。你想野地里的百合花，怎样长起来，他也不劳苦，也不纺线。

lineList.en: And yet I say unto you, That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these.
lineList.cn: 然而我告诉你们，就是所罗门极荣华的时候，那他所穿戴的，还不如这花一朵呢。

lineList.en: Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which to day is, and to morrow is cast into the oven, shall he not much more clothe you, O ye of little faith?
lineList.cn: 你们这小信的人哪，野地的草，今天还在，明天就丢在炉里，神还给他这样的妆饰，何况你们呢。

lineList.en: Therefore take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, What shall we drink? or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed?
lineList.cn: 所以不要忧虑，说，吃什么，喝什么，穿什么。

lineList.en: (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek:) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.
lineList.cn: 这都是外邦人所求的。你们需用的这一切东西，你们的天父是知道的。

lineList.en: But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.
lineList.cn: 你们要先求他的国，和他的义。这些东西都要加给你们了。

lineList.en: Take therefore no thought for the morrow: for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself. Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof.
lineList.cn: 所以不要为明天忧虑。因为明天自有明天的忧虑。一天的难处一天当就够了。
